annotations.description: A modern classic Gin cocktail with Raspberry Liqueur, Vermouth and Cocchi Americano. The Raspberry Beret was created by New York City Bartender Sarah Morriss...
annotations.title: Modern Classic: Raspberry Beret

textContent:
2oz (60ml) Plymouth Gin
.25oz (7.5ml) Raspberry Liqueur
.25oz (7.5ml) Blanc Vermouth
.20oz (7ml) Cocchi Americano
Mint Sprig/Raspberry Garnish

Stir and strain into nick and nora

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mTuQcu-ea6Q
title: Raspberry Beret
